abstract: Gelson Tavares Fernandes (born 2 September 1986 in Praia, Cape Verde) is a Swiss footballer who currently plays as a defensive midfielder for SC Freiburg in the German Bundesliga. He also plays for the Swiss national team.
comment: Gelson Tavares Fernandes (born 2 September 1986 in Praia, Cape Verde) is a Swiss footballer who currently plays as a defensive midfielder for SC Freiburg in the German Bundesliga. He also plays for the Swiss national team.
